Weather Tab
=================
With Weather Tab, you can view the weather forecast in your region in the new tab search & search the web in one convenient place. 

The Weather Tab extension offers convenient web search and features from the Chrome New Tab.

The search features within the extension will be provided by Microsoft Bing, weather information is sourced from weather api.

Please read carefully: By clicking the “ADD TO CHROME” button in the top right hand corner and installing the Weather Tab extension, you accept and agree to installing this Weather Tab Chrome extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab to that provided by the service, and you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy and to receiving any future updates and upgrades. You can uninstall the extension at any time.

Terms of use
https://content.weather-tab.xyz/info/terms.html?domain=weather-tab.xyz&product=WeatherTab

Privacy Policy
https://content.weather-tab.xyz/info/privacy.html?domain=weather-tab.xyz&product=WeatherTab
 
How to remove our extension from Chrome browser:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Our extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
